displayName.english: Seeing Blue

description.english: In “Minotaur Town”, capture all 3 towns and defeat the Minotaur on the same turn.

displayName.english: Seeing Red

description.english: Complete “Minotaur Town” without capturing any Monoliths or the Monastery.

displayName.english: Sneak Attack

description.english: In “Rough Going”, rescue Trillian then use her to defeat Scorpia.

displayName.english: Over The Bridge

description.english: Complete “The Brass Chef” by capturing the town across the bridge before the other two towns.

displayName.english: Cannon Fodder

description.english: Complete “Time For Council” without losing any of your original units.

displayName.english: Backdoor

description.english: Use Flying Machines to capture everything on Cabus’ island in “Shale Island”.

displayName.english: Swift Justice

description.english: Complete "The Wraith Portal" on the same turn that you capture the island town.

displayName.english: The Six Towers

description.english: Capture 6 Wizard Towers in one turn in "Chaos at the Rift".

displayName.english: Foresight

description.english: Use a Monk to find an enemy that is hiding in the forest.

displayName.english: I Shoot Leaves

description.english: Use a Mad Wizard to capture a Wizard Tower.

displayName.english: Pitchfork Party

description.english: Use a Militia to capture a Keep.

displayName.english: Lots of Spells

description.english: Have 5 spells on cooldown at the same time.

displayName.english: Efficient Gorgon Slayer

description.english: Complete “Rough Going” in 10 turns or less.

displayName.english: Inconceivable

description.english: Complete "A Short Cut to Mushrooms" without taking any damage from the firespouts.

description.english: Use Monty to capture all the towns and keeps in "Deja Vu with the Council."

displayName.english: Sweep the Leg

displayName.english: Crystal Method

description.english: Destroy all the moon crystals on the same turn in "The Master Monolith."

displayName.english: Dead Man Walking
